original_text:
Behold, all of you have seen it yourselves;
    why then have you become altogether vain?
korean_text: 너희가 다 이것을 보았거늘 어찌하여 그토록 무익한 사람이 되었는고

sentences.original_text: all of you have seen it yourselves
why then have you become altogether vain?
sentences.korean_translation: 그런데 어찌하여 너희가 전적으로 헛되게 되었느냐?
